game_description: 1. Hiphop dance is an dance VR app on Oculus Quest. We can see clearly virtual characters dance from any position, that is big difference from just video. 2. Song list is here: http://www.cqplanb.com/ccc/Hiphop_Dance-songlist.html 3. We use microphone to react with rhythm, So If you refuse to open microphone permissions when first open app,there won't be reaction with rhythm. App still can work. 3. Please make sure to review your surroundings and clear any obstacles in your play area before starting this game. 4. You 'd better have sweat proof sleeve on your Quest headset, you will sweat a lot happily when playing this. 5. Due to Copyright of music, we don't include music tracks in this app. We support custom import .mp3 file songs into Quest and play. This is how to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QfIdWHGalTY 6. Will update new dance time and time, If there are songs you wonder which are not in list, E-Mail: 408077086@qq.com
review_1: Did not come with music and I could not figure out how to upload was too much work not fun as advertised in intro
review_2: They got me. Nice job. First time I've been ripped off on the Quest Store. Trailer is prerendered and theres no music in the game at all. You have to "download the mp3s" presumably illegally.
